events.comment: Has the player started a click and drag action?

children.text: The first level has a tutorial screen.

actions.text: Fade all parts of the tutorial screen.

children.text: If the player still has undos left, change button animation back to normal.
Is the cursor over any tile?

children.functionDescription: Is the cursor over any tile?

children.text: Player moved to an invalid space.
Expand revealer to match the tiled area revealed with a snap animation.

children.functionDescription: Expand revealer to match the tiled area revealed with a snap animation

children.text: Fix revealer size when the player inverts the selection direction.
Fixes need to be made when the player is holding the left button.
Otherwise, immediately snap to the correct position.
Player started a click and drag action.
Player stopped the click and drag action.
Cursor released on top of an invalid position.
Destroy revealers that are overlapping invalid spaces.
Check if Revealer is in an invalid position.
Count the number of tiles that overlap this revealer.
If the revealer is overlapping more tiles than it should (invalid positioning), destroy it.
Check if revealers are meeting the requirements.

children.functionDescription: Check if revealers are meeting the requirements

children.text: Constantly check how many tiles have been used.
If there are no tiles left, show results.
Hide all the borders by slightly increasing revealers size.
